      • dispatch

        public void dispatch(String type,
                     GeckoBundle message,
                     EventCallback callback)
        Dispatch event to any registered Bundle listeners (non-Gecko thread listeners).
        Parameters:
        type - Event type
        message - Bundle message
        callback - Optional object for callbacks from events.
